tool_description:
Supercharge Your Success with Our Horse Racing Data API: Real-Time Races, Entries, Results, Scratches, and Starts. Access Top Tracks in USA, GB, AUS, ARG, and Beyond!

Potencia tu Éxito con Nuestra API de Datos de Carreras de Caballos:  Carreras, Ejemplares, Resultados, Retirados e Inicios de carreras en Tiempo real
¡Accede a las Mejores Pistas en EE. UU., GB, AUS, ARG y Más!
name: Horse Racing Data Feed
title: Horse Racing Data Feed

api_list.name: Scratched
api_list.description: Get a list of scratched  horses, group by race.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://horse-racing-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com/api/scratch/DD/2024-02-22"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horse-racing-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://horse-racing-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com/api/scratch/{trackcode}/{jornada}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "horse-racing-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Results
api_list.description: You will have a list of the results and payoff.

import requests

url = "https://horse-racing-data-feed.p.rapidapi.com/api/results/{raceid}"

api_list.name: MTP
api_list.description:
Hold your spurs! Here's the lowdown:

MTP:  minutes to post.
Status:

- O: The race is open for wagers.

- IC: Heads to the gate, nearly saddled up.

- SK: They're off! Dust flyin', hooves poundin'.

Don't blink, the finish line's near!
